case.state: You're a Mike, huh? What do they call you? "Ugly Mike?"
You're a Mike, huh? The Rapid Deployment Corps' cloning vats must've been malfunctioning when they made you.
You're a Mike, huh? You must be more defective than Whiskey Foxtrot!
You're a Mike, huh? You expect me to believe that? You're clearly not even a Galahadrim!
Any deed, any price!
Ready to operate!
Do you have all your shots? You will shortly!
Oh good! I need to test this compound on someone besides myself!
If you behave, I'll donate a lollipop to your next of kin when we're done.
Time to operate!
Don't worry, I'm doing this pro bono!
Hope you're well covered!
Fresh specimens, incoming!
It's good to be out in the field again!
Nova, begin recording! I'd like to review this later!
To conserve paper, I will only be handing out liability waivers to the survivors.
If you aren't already afraid of needles, you will be soon!
Oh look, Professor! New subjects!
Look, Professor, volunteers!
Goodness! Who is this cryptid cutie? Just look at those tentacles...
Hey, watch it! That device you're nudging is full of highly volatile fluids! You could cause an outbreak!
Costume? What you see is 100% genuine. If you don't believe me, I can prick you with my needle to prove it.
First of all, I don't need your pity. Second, I am no victim of hubris. I perform my experiments on others, not myself.
Magic? Ha! What are you, a child? Magic doesn't exist.
Can't say that I have. Is that on a planet in the Solus system or has it already been consumed?
Oh great, Orendi... So much for relaxing...
Oh great, Orendi... Don't worry, everyone, I'm carrying heavy sedatives.
Alright, who's been messing with my cloning vats?
Whoever thought it was a funny idea to invite my clone is going to pay!
Whoever thinks they're going to see some selfcest action is dead wrong! I will not have sex with my clone in public!
Alright, who's been messing with my cloning vats?
Whoever thought it was a funny idea to invite my clones is going to pay!
Whoever thinks they're going to see some selfcest action is dead wrong! I will not have sex with my clones in public!
Ugh, couldn't we have picked somewhere cleaner? Be glad I can't catch anything here!
I hope for your sake you've had all your shots. I certainly won't be catching anything here tonight!
Let's get the introductions over with quickly. I am Dr. Beatrix Lucavi, renowned Jennerit scientist. You should be honored to be playing with me.
Let's get the introductions over with quickly. I am Dr. Beatrix Lucavi, and this here is Professor Hopkins. Say hello, Professor.
Oh, right, introductions. I am Dr. Beatrix Lucavi, scientific prodigy, daughter of a prominent Silent Sister, blah blah blah. Can we move on now?
Oh, right, introductions. I am Dr. Beatrix Lucavi, and if you ever call me "Trixie" I'll inject Measles directly into your bloodstream.
Oh, right, introductions. I am Dr. Beatrix Lucavi -- yes, the very same one who graduated from the Archsciences Academy at the age of 14, impressive, I know.
I was hoping there'd be some male participants, but oh well. I don't discriminate any potential vict-- I mean patients.
One male opponent, huh? If you're expecting this to turn into a four-on-one harem, you're dead wrong! Beatrix Lucavi does not share her men!
One male opponent, huh? I hope you're not expecting a harem. Beatrix Lucavi does not share her men! The others can have you when I'm done!
Oh my! Four of you? Why, if you were to gang up on me, there'd be nothing I could do!
Oh dear! I'm outnumbered by men! I hope none of you try to take advantage of this situation!
Oh my! All my opponents are men! I must be dreaming!
Oh dear! Am I really the only woman in this match? Lucky me!
Am I the only woman here? Why, I'm honored!
A tiki bar? How tacky. Why don't we put on hula skirts and drink from coconuts while we're at it?
Oh good, a tiki bar. Nothing gets me in the mood more than cultural appropriation.
Oh good, public humiliation, my favorite!
If you think I'm afraid to strip in front of a crowd, you're wrong, but you'll have to work for that privilege!
Oh good, I just love the feel of sand between my no-longer-existent toes.
None for me, thank you!
Immediate perfection. That's just how I operate.
Just one for me.
One, please!
Give me ~cards.text~ cards.
I need ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ new cards, stat!
What's that, Professor?... I agree! ~Cards.text~, it is!
Good luck beating my hand, you worms!
Ah haha ha! In your faces! You won't be beating me this round!
Did you really think you could get me to lose? Ah haha haha!
Ah haha haha! It takes more than a few bad rounds to get Dr. Beatrix Lucavi to publicly pleasure herself!
If you all somehow manage to beat my hand this round, you're going to experience a new sort of "severance pay."
Good luck beating my hand, you worms!
Ah haha ha! In your faces! You won't be beating me this round!
Well, I don't know about you guys, but I'm definitely safe.
A lovely set of cards for a lovely lady.
Look, Professor! A hand as great as you!
What can I say? I'm a natural at poker!
A good hand? Why, I'm so surprised!
Goodness, what a good hand! I swear I'm not cheating!
A lady such as myself deserves only the best!
With a hand like this, maybe one of you will finally strip a real item.
Looks like I won't be stripping this time. Take this as an opportunity for one of you to take of a real item.
Oh look at that, a good hand for someone who deserves it!
Good luck to the rest of you. You're going to need it.
So sorry, my hand is too good for me to lose this time.
If you think I'm stripping with a hand like this, you're dumber than you look.
Looks like one of you will be stripping this time. Too bad, so sad.
Aha, just try and beat me now!
Ah haha. It takes more than a little luck to get my panties off.
Ugh, I will not settle for "good enough!"
Beatrix Lucavi does not settle for "good enough!"
Ugh, a pair? That's it?
Ugh, I will not settle for "good enough!"
Beatrix Lucavi does not settle for "good enough!"
Ugh, a pair? That's it?
These cards better keep me in, or someone's going to have an "accident" later!
Let's add a special rule: who ever has the best hand gets injected with a mystery substance!
If I lose this hand, someone's going to wake up with less organs than normal!
What? Me? Nervous about my hand? W-why don't be ridiculous! Haha ha, aha haha ha ha!
Who do you think will lose this round, Hopkins?
Eh, a pair's a pair.
One pair, standard procedure.
If you think a pair is going to unsettle me, you have no idea how good surgeons are under pressure.
I've gotten by on less than this before. Improvisational surgery is sort of a hobby of mine.
This hand is so unremarkable that I won't even remark on how unremarkable it is.
My odds of survival with this hand are quite low, but low odds of survival have never stopped me before!
Looks like this is it for me. It was fun while it lasted.
Looks like I'm going to lose. Oh well, winning would've been nice, but I'm not against putting on a little show.
A bad hand? Oh no! I don't want to do the very thing I came here to do!
This bad hand can't keep me down as long as I have you as my other hand, Professor!
I'll accept this bad hand for now, but know that I intend on winning.
Oh no, my hand is junk. Boohoo, poor me. Is that what you were hoping to hear?
I suppose there is only so much that can be done to avoid a junk hand.
Not even a hand as bad as this can rattle me. It's still possible to win with a high card, and I've survived tougher odds than this!
It's a shame I can't replace this hand with a stronger, robotic one.
Let's be honest here: none of us have any real control over our cards. This game is all luck. That doesn't stop me from wanting to turn someone into a pin cushion for losing, though!
Looks like someone's going to get really sick really soon!
I'm upset! And when I'm upset, the ground shakes!
Someone around here is about to wind up asystolic!
You can't spell "malpractice" without "practice." Wink wink nudge nudge!
Okay, Beatrix... Sigh, compose yourself.
I blame these cards entirely on you, ~player~!
Damn this hand!... Oh, not you, Professor. You did nothing wrong.
Are these cards a joke? They must be a joke, right?
Oopsie! I think I forgot to exchange my cards!... What do you mean I already did?!
Tell me, have you ever considered having sex with something that's not humanoid? You know, like a dog, or a Varelsi.
Gee, two ghosts, and only one me. If only I had some way of deciding between you two.
Nothing to worry about. Just relax, lie on your back, and apply immediate pressure to your temples.
Yes, you heard that right, this pretty little thing is 71 years old. What's my secret? Sustainment, of course! I'm basically immortal.
Alright, I'll take your bet. I'll start thinking of my question now, because you're surely going to lose.
A psychologist, huh? You guys just can't stay away from me, can you?
I was going to be mad at you for your failed attack, Juri, but now I'm interested in your... hair trigger. I've got to study you!
Ha! Wouldn't you like to know what I'm into.
Yes yes, I'm quite aware of how phasic blades work -- I know an esteemed bladesmith personally. There's nothing magical about them.
Flowers? Flowers? That's your saving grace? Ah hahaha ha ha!
You're eating it? That's absolutely disgusting! The peel doesn't protect it from anything like you might think!
Of course I do. If you must know, my mother is a very prominent Silent Sister, without whom I wouldn't be alive today - for more reasons than one.
I'm just going to pretend I didn't hear you take the name of the Silent Sisters in vain.
You know, you're not the first Varimorph I've met who thinks what they do is magic. You wouldn't happen to be related to and/or affiliated with Orendi, would you?
I knew I smelled a corpse!
I knew it! You're a living corpse as well!
Take them off if you want. It's your ass this'll come back to bite, not mine.
Just because you have an active immune system doesn't mean you should go around doing disgusting things and risk getting sick. You wouldn't lick a toilet seat, would you?
That was sarcasm, by the way. I knew from the start - and no, not because I can detect gender on sight. It was because of how hard you were trying to be convincing.

Listen, if you're going to insist on hiding your rotting flesh, then you need to at least take enough care of it so that it's not rotting flesh. Luckily, I know some things about corpse preservation that I can teach you.
What I said to your friend applies to you, too: if you're going to insist on keeping this a secret, you need to take better care of your skin!

condition.saying: Planet topographies are so interesting - some like Zebes and Arcterra are just comprised of one type, and others like Earth or Bryyo consist of many across their surface.

case.state: You know why that is, right, hunter? It's pretty basic astronomy: The size of the planet, what it's made of, and its orbit around its star all factor into what sorts of biomes can form on its surface. Some planets simply aren't capable of being more than their base materials.
Honey, just look at me. Don't you think I've already changed everything about myself I've wanted to?
Are you delirious from some sort of pain reliever? I was asking what planet the school is on. It was not a simile.
I only know one: "There once was a girl named Trix, whose body nobody could fix. She went to the doctor, who stabbed her and stocked her, with every pill in the mix."
"Friends with benefits" are pretty inevitable when you're as old as I am -- and sexually active to begin with, of course.
Who doesn't enjoy being the center of attention? It's only natural to enjoy having multiple attractive individuals desire you.
You say that like you can't do both. I can show you what I mean, if you like.
Emotional energy? What kind of nonsense are you talking about? I mean, sure, emotions can change a person's body temperature, but that's hardly energy!
I have other tools, you know! A doctor of my caliber requires many tools. Only a baffoon would attempt to use nothing but the same tool for every job!
Say whatever you like, but the fact of the matter is that egg-splicing is an artificial birth process, and to my experience, such doesn't always go so well.

I'm not sure that someone as sexually inexperienced as you should be using her body to defeat monsters. Even if some of them have slimy, writhing tentacles, or... smooth, silky scaless, o-or... soft, feathery wings...
Indeed, your body is quite nice. Very fit, healthy-looking, and curvaceous. Your hair, however, could use some attention -- and I don't just mean the hair on your head.

condition.saying: There are two kinds of people in the world: those who are Cagliostro, and those who are not.

case.state: Oh, just screw yourself already -- literally. If a mirror is insufficient, a clone can be provided to you.
Food is quite an effective motivator for many creatures, which stems from basic survival instincts. That said, no, I don't use this method on myself. I have other motivating factors.
"Good" and "bad" is only relative to one's interests. It's easy to see your own actions as "good" actions when they accomplish your own idea of "good."

I'm no stranger to field work! I was part of the crew that delved Ekkunar's Aztanti ruins searching for a way to defeat the Varelsi. It was a prime opportunity to potentially rediscover any long-lost microorganisms!
... Don't tell me... You did, didn't you...?
Do you get what I'm saying, kitten? This game alone won't solve your problems. You're going to need to put in more work than that!
I think I like this look better for you, Juri. Have you ever considered permanently ditching your pants?
Nope! Not at all!
No. No I wouldn't.
I don't need to be a professional to tell you "no."
I don't need to be a professional to tell you that you, indeed, do not suffer from sexy.
None for me! Alcohol doesn't affect my system properly, so I'd get all the cons with none of the pros.
Hey, Grunt, put your phone away! I don't have any vials of attention span on me.
Oh yes, please do! The more eroticism we can inject into this match, the better!
Can't say I have. I'm not much of a gambler -- not when it comes to games, anyway.

I flew here like I would any other planet in the Solus system. Although... come to think of it, this place isn't like any planet in the Solus system. I must've been so pre-occupied with my work that I didn't notice us hit some sort of wormhole...
Mild arthritis? You know that's a very easily treatable condition, right? Even a simple Tissue Synthesizer could cure you of it!
Oh, how cute! But I don't buy this "ghost" thing. It's not like I've never seen a hologram or a cloud of microorganisms before.
That's easy! Harresburra are the cutest thing I've ever seen! You have got to see them wiggle their cute fluffy tails at least once in your life!
... Who died?... Seriously, you can't hide that scent from me, I'd know it anywhere!
Oh my! I've just got to get a sample of your genes, Aella!
Oh! I didn't realize holograms were allowed to play with us. Nova would be excited to know that!
Don't ask questions you don't want the answers to, dear.
Honey, I've been a doctor for longer than you've been alive.
Aw, look at the little bunny girl! Are you lost? Do you need help finding your way home?
Hmm. I'd have to say approximately zero times.
I'd say that you've caught it so few times that I could develop a vaccine given a sample of your antibodies.
I could count the number of times on my right arm. With fingers. Do you get what I'm saying?
Ooh! Does someone here have Coulrophobia? If so, then I'm delighted to have you here with me, Joey!
You're a ghost? Sure, I believe that like I believe that Aurox is obeying Shayne of his own accord.
You're a ghost? Like I've never seen a hologram before!
Hold on a moment! Ryuko, did your shirt just... blink? I mean this in the most literal sense possible: what the hell are you wearing?
You need to lose weight, huh? Well, there certainly are medical procedures that can help, but to be honest, they're not fun.
You came to a poker game already topless? Now that's the kind of suicidal overconfidence that I like to see!
Ugh, great, another Magnus. Do you have anything to take off, bitbot, or are you just here to annoy us?
Aw, I know a rabbit among foxes when I see one! Tell me, cupcake, what are you doing here?
To answer your earlier question, Aella: it won't hurt during, but your arm may be a little sore after.
Ugh, another prosecutor? How many lawyers do I have to say this to? They signed waivers.
I may be a freak, but at least I'm a freak with manners.
Okay then, do go on. Explain to me how getting bad luck from seeing my panties is not an insult.
This "syringe" is the “Incistyx” Javelin-class Injector, and it's capable of delivering ampoules through Thrall derma from up to 200 meters away. Impressive, I know.
Technically speaking, yes, robots can gain weight, but if you're trying to ask if I can gain weight because you think I'm a robot, yes, I can as well. That's why I watch what I eat.
Not even close. My dress is satin with a latex polymer lining. My underwear is also latex polymer but with a cotton lining.

The fact that you said "maybe they fit too well" tells me that they don't. Besides, if they fit you well, they wouldn't rip. Deande's leggings have never ripped, and they hug her form like a second skin.
Like hell I'm telling you. There's a difference between being shy and having dignity.

No matter how healthy you keep your body, a tumor can pop up and ruin your life. Tumors are formed by the accumulation of abnormal cells, so they're effectively something your body does to itself and there's nothing you can do to stop it.

Unfortunately we don't know of much we can do to defeat the Varelsi, Aella. But considering you come from a planet in a system that has long since been darkened, it seems quite likely that there's a way to reverse some of the damage they've caused.
Oh my, that's quite the nasty scar! How do you not know it's there?
Ooh, sorry, I don't have the budget for donations. Unlike those kind, kind souls over at Minion Robotics, I'm not profiting off of the war for the last star.

If you're starting to have difficulties reading the cards, let me know. That would be one of the side effects of overexposure to the Incistyx's fumes, which would mean I misjudged this location's ventilation systems.
I'm getting impatient. If this game doesn't end soon, I'm going to cut everyone's clothes off!
Goodness, this game is certainly taking a long time.
Are we going to end anytime soon? I have specimen to tend to.
And then there was one.
It's just you and me now. Scared? You should be.
It's just us now. Good luck! You're going to need it!
Where are my manners? My name is Dr. Beatrix Lucavi. If you haven't heard of me, then I officially diagnose you with Philistine-itus!
You... are aware of the threat the Varelsi pose to all of existence, right? Swallowing all the stars in the universe within their veil? I mean, how can you not know?
Is everyone done gawking at their cards yet? I'd like to move on!
With all the time everyone spends reading their hands, I could take a nap!
Can we move on yet? I'm falling asleep.
Yes yes, the cards are very nice, now let's move on!
What do you think of ~player~, Professor?... I know, right?
These cards are boring. Who wants to hear a distur-- I mean interesting biology fact to stay entertained?
So it's clear, I hold no loyalty to Rendain. He's a coward and completely unfit to rule the Jennerit Empire.
You all remembered to brush your teeth before coming here, right? You can't expect to get any with the breath of a cedar bear!

Have any of you ever heard of Congenital Insensitivity to Pain? As you can guess, it's a disorder that causes an individual to be unable to feel pain, depression, anxiety, and even fear! It's very fascinating!

So, what planets do you all come from? I'm sure most of you come from systems darkened by the Varelsi, huh? I come from Tempest, myself, which you may have already guessed. I've never stepped on the actual surface, of course -- I lived on part of the Echelon, the "floating cities."

In case you were wondering, this lovely device here is the Incistyx, a Javalin-class injector specially designed for Thrall treatments. It also contains the brain of the cutest little Harresburra, Professor Hopkins.
Surely you all have some juicy gossip to share. Dish! I want to hear everything!
So, full honesty, what do you think of my body in its entirety? I mean, I already know it's perfect, but you're welcome to be wrong.

What are your opinions on Minion Robotics? Personally, I never had much faith in their so-called "Magna Carta" to keep all the AI in line, so I've always preferred the employment of Thralls. They're much easier to keep in line, and there's no risk of a "Great Severance!"

state.text: So, full honesty, what do you think of my body in its entirety? I mean, I already know it's perfect, but you're welcome to be wrong. You have to at least admit I look damn good for a 71-year-old!

case.state: It's quite disappointing that the Varelsi all vanish when they die. I want to study them!
Unfortunately, both the place I got my dress at and my drycleaners were swallowed by the Varelsi's veil, so do try to keep any messes you make self-contained!

Have any of you ever had any sort of major surgery performed on you? No judgement, of course! I've performed several surgeries on myself! Sometimes these things are necessary... and sometimes you just want something altered!

As much as Galilea likes to put on that "Wraith of Bliss" act and pretending to hate the Jennerit, you know she and Ambra were more than just good friends beforehand. The sexual tension between them is so strong it makes me start to feel sexually frustrated.

You know Phoebe Hemsworth, right? Current heir to the Hemsworth Intelligence Enterprise? Sometimes I hear a faint buzzing coming from her. I think she's so preoccupied with her hobbies that stealth vibrator use is all she can do to get off.
It's pretty obvious what the real purpose of Nova's "robot suit" is, right? I mean, why else would an old fart like Kleese build a female Magnus a body?

I'll be honest, I just don't like operating on the artificial bodies of robots. There's no viscera to it! No delicacy, or squelch, or squish! Even artificial parts on organic beings have some fun to them!

Before anyone says anything, yes, I'm aware there have been three Thrall rebellions. Do you know why there were three? Because it took multiple attempts. Thralls are not intelligent enough to succeed on their own.

I've toyed with the idea of a "Magna Carta" type organism in my own experiments -- an alpha-like leader, which I like to call the "Encephalon Matriarch," psychically linked for superior pack synergy. Unfortunately, my subjects have yet to survive the procedure.

There's no need to worry about the Incistyx, by the way. This area is well-ventilated enough that you shouldn't experience any adverse effects. I'm also not inclined to use it on you unless you seriously upset me... or ask nicely.
In case you were wondering, the Incistyx contains a Harresburra brain to aid in the manipulation of the device. It has its drawbacks, but the precision is worth it.

If you think the Incistyx is frightening, you should see the Broadsword-class injectors! Those bad boys are designed to inject fluids directly into your bones! Sadly, they're not mobile in the slightest.
Before you ask, yes, they do make smaller injectors than this: Dagger-class injectors, handheld-style devices. They're practical for most patients, sure, but they don't have enough oomph for me.
Don't forget, once you hit sexual maturity, age is but a number. Although with age comes experience, so that's not entirely true...
Would you look at that. I'm winning. What a surprise.
Winning is fun, blah blah blah. Does it really matter what I say now? You're about to see my breasts.
Likewise. It's always nice to be amongst people of similar intellect.
Believe it or not, science has actually proven that pink is the most attractive skin color, right above green and white -- ivory white, that is, not caucasian.
No, of course not! I suck them with my lips!
Don't be ridiculous! What sort of loon performs oral with her teeth? I use my lips!
What, have you never met an alien before? My skin is incredibly healthy thanks to my complete immunity to disease. Jealous? You should be!
It's the “Incistyx” Javelin-class Injector, designed to be capable of delivering ampoules through Thrall derma from up to 200 meters away. Impressed? You should be!
Ahaha. Listen, honey, I know a thing or two about psychology. You're clearly trying to make me feel bad about myself so you can feel good about yourself.
Ahaha. Listen, honey, I know a thing or two about psychology. It's obvious that you just want to watch me lose my composure because it makes you feel in control.
Several things, actually. Sedatives, stimulatives, and a few different live viruses - for experiments, obviously.
To think there was once a point where people thought I wouldn't live past 16.
You say that as if you're going to beat me, yet you're already out.
Sorry, I just don't believe the numbers of someone who thinks magic is real. It's nothing personal, I don't believe Orendi, Boldur, or any of those silly Eldrids, either.
Oh, nothing too fancy, just a basic nerve-linked synthetic limb system with a ceramic casing.
Ah yes, the "Incistyx" Javelin-class Injector. Capable of of delivering ampoules through Thrall derma from up to 200 meters away. My pride and joy!
It's for injections, obviously! Precision injections from up to 200 meters away, at that!
Of course not, don't be ridiculous! We use a wide variety of weapons -- perhaps more than an other surviving race in the universe!
Impressed? You should be. This is the "Incistyx" Javalin-class Injector, the most advanced tool in my collection.
I am my own experiment, thank you very much!
I'll take that as a complement, and no, this wing is not for flight. It's actually a counterbalance piece for when I have the Incistyx equipped.
The tanks are actually filled with a mutable fluid, which I use to create large quantities of the other compounds I keep on me. It's only red right now from the viral agent I injected.
Oh, absolutely, but that's the price we pay for such an advanced injector -- isn't that right, Professor?

Funny, you remind me of some of my ex-coworkers. They're toiling away in some lab on Echelon while I'm out here literally saving the universe -- not at this very moment, of course. Guess who has the last laugh.
Depends. What's in it for me?

I didn't do it to become a "support sniper," I did it to improve my quality of life! I just happen to also posses a high-precision long-range injection device capable of piercing through even the thickest of skins!
Stand? What am I, some sort of cake to be put on display? This is a high-class injector, I'll have you know, not some kind of propping piece!
Stand? What am I, a bicycle? This is a high-class injector, I'll have you know, not some kind of propping piece!
Why thank you, Juri. I pride myself on my dental hygiene.
I'm a woman. I'm not surprised you've never seen one before.
I'm a woman. You've never seen one before?
That's not even remotely true. My close-range abilities can be just as deadly as my ranged ones!
That's where you're wrong, Firefly. I'm just as lethal at close-range as I am at a distance.
Why thank you, Sei. I love Hopkins too. Yes I do. Yes I do!
Sweetheart, you just met me. How do you know this isn't how my skin is supposed to look?
No, Rapier-class Injectors are a whole different beast. This is the “Incistyx” Javelin-class Injector, and it's far superior!
It's only as lethal as any other injector. The fact that it's large and acting as an arm doesn't change that.
Don't count your chickens before they hatch, princess. I'm not out yet!
Surrender? Do you even know who I am?
I assure you, it's very standard, very healthy, and very clean!
Thriller Bark? I am no one's experiment but my own, I'll have you know!
It's only a weapon if you consider needles weapons.
Aw, that's cute, you think you're the one in control here, huh, ~other~? But you're not the one packing sedatives, now are you?
Me again? Fine!
Are you kidding me? I'm out of clothes just like that?
Oh well. The sun will be great for my skin.
I'll show you pests how to really strip!
Watch and learn. This is how you play strip poker.
You weren't trying to leave me out of the fun, now, were you?
Age, beauty, and brains before... Heh heh, what do you have again, ~player~?
Looks like I'll be setting the pace. Try to keep up, everyone!
Ugh, I can't believe I'm going to be the first one to expose herself!
Are you serious? I'm the first one who has to get naked?
Enjoy this while you can, ~player~! Life can be shorter than you think!
Oh well. Naked doesn't mean defeated.
No big deal. I worked too hard on this body to not show it off -- and I don't mean exercising.
Wow, either I'm really good at poker, or you all suck at it! Let's go with both.
Oh well. You spent enough time appreciating my midriff, it's about time I give you another part of my body to appreciate.
About time! I was beginning to think I'd never lose a hand!
You're about to be really appreciative of my wardrobe decisions, ~other~.
Get ready to be appreciative of my distaste for trinkets, ~other~.
How is it even possible that I'm the one losing?! I'm the smartest, most cunning person here!
I lost. Oh no. It's the end of the world.
If you think I'm ashamed to show off my body, then you don't know that I've replaced every part of my body I used to be insecure about!
Oh dear, I lost. Time to reach for the smallest article on my person.
Although clothed masturbation is an option, it would be more pleasant for the both of us if I were naked, wouldn't you agree? Well, let's take it one step at a time.
I'll give you one guess as to what I'm taking off. No really, guess. I'll wait.
Look, I could say something clever, or I can just strip. I think I know which you'd prefer.
Take a guess at what comes next. Go ahead, I'll wait.

That's all well and good, but you do realize the Varelsi are a much bigger threat to all life than that, right?
Yes, never mind the planets either entirely ocean or have no water at all -- which are mostly all swallowed by the Varelsi's veil.
You think you can get away, huh? Firing sedative in three, two, one...
Oh no, she's gone. If only someone here had sedatives on hand...
Oh no, she's gone. And nothing of value was lost.
Oh well, too bad, she's gone. Let's keep this game going!
Teleporting away, huh? All bark and no bite, I suppose.
Great choice, ~name~!... Oh wait, did you say "~Clothing~?" I thought you said "Everything at once."
Oh my! How daring of you!
Gasp! You're taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off?! How ever will you manage?
What's that, Hopkins?... That's right, you could do better than that!
Aw, how cute, you think that counts as stripping!
I've removed cysts that were bigger than that -- you don't want to know by how much!
I've researched enough diseases to know that something that starts off innocuous can grow into something much more... exciting. That's what you're doing here, right?... Right?
The only thing this does is prove you have the appropriate appendages for removing clothes, which was already obvious.
Ah yes, what everyone wants to see you strip: your ~clothing~. You're sure to get our endorphins flowing that way!
Just take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off quickly, like a band-aid!
Yawn! Wake me up when you're done taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off.
I don't think you could make taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off erotic even if you tried.
Come on! Grow some nerves!... You do have nerves, right?
This is neither the time, nor the place.
I've made test tube lifeforms who are better strippers than you!
Ooh, let me cut ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off for you! Pleeeease?
Like it or not, your other identity joined in on this game for a reason, and I'm pretty sure that reason wasn't because she knew she's wouldn't show off some!

state.text: How about you and your silly "Team Aqua" start taking back stars instead? Or is that too big a task for you "pirates?"
The Varelsi have taken far more from us than any human civilization has ever taken from animals. If you want to do something productive, help with that instead!
Land is all well and good, we do need more of it, but being more hydrophobic than my ceramic bio-casing is not the solution.
If you think sea life is the worst of your problems, you've clearly never seen a Varelsi face-to-face.

case.state: Ooh, rustic. Not bad.
Nice outfit. Did it come with a free Frisbee?
Ah, how lovely! That outfit is much nicer than your last one!
Hope that outfit didn't give you scurvy; I'm all out of vitamin C supplements.
So you're a maid now, huh? Great! My quarters need dusting. Hop to it!
Look, Hopkins, it's Little Red Riding Hood. Do you want to be the big bad wolf?
A sweater dress? How tacky!
Oh, don't worry. I don't kink shame. If you like dressing up as a ladybug when you dominate people, I won't judge.
Well, you may not have actually stripped, but you're more exposed now, so I'll take it.
Looks like your outfit-changing device failed to materialize a sleeve. Shotty workmanship, clearly.

condition.saying: You can’t find it in your heart at all to let one cute, lovely witch like me to sit out the next hand, can you?!

case.state: Nope! Suck it up, buttercup!
Though, I can't tell if your transformation means you'll be more fun or less fun now.

In quite a lot of ways, actually! Advanced suits of armor can enhance the wearer's strength and speed, provide information in the helmet, and store weapons and tools. Kemessian Shock Armor does all of these things, for example.
Relatively, no, but it's obnoxiously infectious and can lead to some unpleasant complications. If you have it, you risk spreading it to others here!
What's that, a sort of mantra? Nothing more than the placebo effect, I'm sure.
Cat ears? That's it? You're bad at having shocking secrets!
Cat ears? Cat ears? That's your big secret? Aha haha ha ha!
Cat ears, huh? If you're so ashamed of them, I can easily remove them for you!
Cat ears? That's it? You poor, naive child.
Cat ears? That's it? Honey, I see stranger creatures than you every day!
Cat ears? That's it? Honey, I've made stranger looking creatures than you!
Did you really think cat ears would shock me? Do you even know who I am?
You believe in magic? How cute! You sound just like one of those Aelfrin dolts!
Sure. Let's go with that.
Wh-what? I don't do that! W-what would give you that idea? Ahaha ha ha ha!
Though, you can bring in all the bats in the universe; won't make your item choices less terrible.
... You're kidding, right?
If you like, I can replace those legs of yours! Feet are not necessary when you have a good pair of legs!
If you like, I can replace those legs of yours! Give you a nice, feet-free pair like mine!
Are you sure about that? There aren't more rules you need to clarify first?
Oh, you were just changing clothes. Am I supposed to be impressed? I built a clothes-changing device like that when I was twelve.
You're joking, right? Right?
That's a great joke, Twilight! Haha haha ha ha, ah haha ha ha!
Obviously you're using a remote teleporter to disassemble and reassemble your shoes on an atomic scale. Child's play, really.
I must say, you're quite stable... for a Varimorph.
If you don't knock it off with the transformations, I'm going to shoot some Atomoxetine into your system!
And, of course, the dosage is constantly changing because your system will inevitably become used to it and you'll just be back at square one.
So you see, if there's something you want, you've got to chase it! Pounce on it and snap its neck in your jaws, because it's not going to just walk happily into your gullet!
Shame. Would've been great to have a rousing conversation about our studies while you strip, but now I trust your research about as far as I can throw you.
If you're really a goddess, why don't you use your "devine powers" to give me an orgasm right this second?
Oh, I'm sorry, am I being insensitive? I guess I just don't have any sympathy for those who ignore modern medicine.
Genes, huh? In that case, I need you to let me have a sample!
These "quirks" of yours aren't caused by any exterior factors, are too drastic a change, and are hardly patterned, so they're mutations.
Smart? Ahaha, no, but undoubtly fascinating regardless.
We're not even going to get to see when you take something off? I might as well be playing strip poker with Caldarius!
Oh good, you came back! I guess we won't be needing sedatives!
Oh good, subject - I mean Florina - has returned!
You know that you're allowed to wear a shirt under your gi, right?
If you're so reluctant to remove that tiny thing, then what are you even doing here? You should go home before taking your socks off makes you cry.
There! Over before we knew it! Like a shot! Or a mercy-killing!
Eh, ~clothing.ifPlural(those were choking hazards|that was a choking hazard)~ anyway.
Well, I guess I'm one to talk about necessary evils.
Let's not drag this out any longer than it needs to be. Cards, please!
Satisfied? Me either! Let's move on!

Now that you've washed your hands of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, let's hope you don't feel an obsessive-compulsion to do that again several more times.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those were tacky accessories|That was a tacky accessory)~, anyway.
I hope ~clothing.ifPlural(those accessories were|that accessory was)~ tying your outfit together. Literally. I hope your outfit falls off without your ~clothing~.

You do realize there's a smart, cute doctor in need of arousing right in front of you, right?
Is that your idea of sexy, or are you deliberately trying to put me to sleep?
